changeSet.author: ртуровић
changeSet.sql: create sequence company_edit_seq; create table if not exists company_edit ( id bigint not null constraint company_edit_pkey primary key, address varchar(255), bank_account varchar(255), city varchar(255), county varchar(255), name varchar(255), tax_identifier varchar(255), website varchar(255), linkedin_url varchar(255), twitter_url varchar(255), facebook_url varchar(255), custom_url varchar(255), request_timestamp timestamp, company_category_id bigint constraint company_edit_fk_on_company_category references company_category, company_id bigint constraint company_edit_fk_on_company references company_category, request_state_id bigint constraint company_edit_fk_on_request_state references request_state );
